Analyte(s): Antibodies to JC virus (John Cunningham Virus)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Focus Diagnostics STRATIFY JCV DxSelect ELISA assay for qualitative detection of antibodies to JC virus in human serum or plasma for risk stratification of progressive multifocal leukoencephalopathy in multiple sclerosis patients considering natalizumab therapy.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of antibodies to JC virus in human serum or plasma, used in conjunction with other clinical data to aid risk stratification for progressive multifocal leukoencephalopathy development in multiple sclerosis patients receiving or considering natalizumab therapy.
